ai:cl.c: Provides support for the filling and stroking of vectors with colour gradients.

ai:f.c: The horizontal center point of the gradient.
The vertical center point of the gradient.
The default background colour to use when clipping is enabled.
Assigns a pre-defined colourmap to the gradient.
Defines the colour space to use when interpolating gradient colours.
Dimension flags are stored here.
The size of the focal radius for radial gradients.
The horizontal focal point for radial gradients.
The vertical focal point for radial gradients.
String identifier for a vector.
A linked list of transform matrices that have been applied to the gradient.
A unique identifier for the vector.
The radius of the gradient.
Affects the rate of change for colours in the gradient.
Determines the rendering behaviour to use when gradient colours are cycled.
Defines the colours to use for the gradient.
Total number of stops defined in the Stops array.
Applies a transform to the gradient.
Specifies the type of gradient (e.g. RADIAL, LINEAR)
Defines the coordinate system for X1, Y1, X2 and Y2.
Initial X coordinate for the gradient.
Final X coordinate for the gradient.
Initial Y coordinate for the gradient.
Final Y coordinate for the gradient.
